roleset.name: travel
roleset.note: TRANSIT-V NOTES: Frame by Perryn, updated by Julia, 11/2010. No Vncls. (from transit.01-v)

example.name: transit-v: travel through
example.text: No US hips have transited through the canal since before the October 12th attack on the US estroyer Cole in Aden.
example.arg: since before the October 12th attack on the US destroyer Cole in Aden

example.name: transit-v: both args, + MNR
example.text: They transited the area on foot

example.name: transit-n
example.text: Others died when herded into railcars for a 10-mile transit.

roleset.name: passing, changing, in motion
roleset.note: TRANSIENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on Medi-tmprl1to8. (from transient.01-j)

example.name: transient-j
example.text: Her thyroid peroxidase antibody has come back positive and her thyroid stimulating immunoglobulin is negative , so this is most likely post-partum thyroiditis and it would be expected to resolve spontaneously over 6 - 12 weeks , possibly to enter a hypothyroid phase , which-1 [*-1] could be transient or permanent .
